text: The 2014–15 Russian Bandy Super League was the 23rd season of the present highest Russian men's bandy top division, Russian Bandy Super League. The regular season began on 8 November 2014, and the final was played in Khabarovsk on 21 March 2015. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
